info-section.title:
We make DeFi easy as
 possible for everyone
description: The DeFi and crypto space in general is still in its genesis stage and has yet to experience mainstream adaption. That said, the AWINO ecosystem is built to be simple, intuitive and user friendly for new investors. But yet, has all the tools for experienced DeFi enthusiasts, non the less.
AWINO takes a problem-solving approach and addresses the following issues we are currently faced with in the DeFi and crypto space in general.

benefit-section.title: Why you should use our platform
benefit-section.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula eget dolor.

items.title: Liquidity / stability:
items.description: AWINO has built mechanics within the token economics with the intent to strategically provide liquidity into the ecosystem. This will allow for seamless trades and bring stability in an otherwise, volatile market.

items.title: Profitability / sustainability:
items.description: To ensure sustainability, AWINO invests within its own ecosystem. Revenue is re-invested 100% back into the protocol through buy backs and locking LP tokens into the treasury forever. This allows the protocol to be profitable, while accumulating appreciating assets in its treasury.

items.title: Safety and security:
items.description: Security and safety are major issue that investors face on a daily basis. To address these, AWINO has developed a state-of-the-art wallet application with above industry standard security features.

items.title: Profitability / sustainability:
items.description: To ensure sustainability, AWINO invests within its own ecosystem. Revenue is re-invested 100% back into the protocol through buy backs and locking LP tokens into the treasury forever. This allows the protocol to be profitable, while accumulating appreciating assets in its treasury.
